CustomField.description: Environment / Facilities: Perform routine maintenance on facilities and make repairs as needed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Environment / Facilities: Perform routine maintenance on facilities and making repairs as needed -RH & Temperature: This include but does not limit to the maintenance of equipment, servicing, monitoring and generating of data to track temperature & humidity control -Cleanliness: Monitor the safety and cleanliness of interior and exterior areas. Maintain a safe and clean warehouse at all times. Ensuring cleanliness at ALL areas including but limited to the loading bay, storage area, viewing rooms and
CustomField.label: Environment / Facilities
